subject: Order No. SSN4104
description_text:
Good morning, I wanted information regarding order No. SSN4104 from 29-11-2025, which as of today, 22-12-2025, has not yet arrived. The tracking shows it has been stuck in Milan for a week now. I wanted to know if this waiting time is normal or if there is some problem. Thank you

Sent from iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Marco Orangis, Hello, how can I help you?
